INTERVAL.description: Type defining an interval of any ordered type.

DURATION.description: Duration type based on IS8601 representation.

data.description: Data of the observation, in the form of a HISTORY of EVENTs.

OBSERVATION.description: ENTRY subtype used to represent observation information in time, as either a single or multiple samples.

DATE.description: Date type based on IS8601 representation.

DATE_TIME.description: Date Time type based on IS8601 representation.

TIME.description: Time type based on IS8601 representation.
